t: Amazon.com : Ovaltine Original Light Add Water 300G : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I have to say I don't clearly remember the flavor of the Pre-Nestle Ovaltine, but I do remember it changed and not for the better after the original old fashioned Chicago company sold its brand to Nestlé. I remember having the new and old can and comparing with disappointment.

t: Amazon.com: Ovaltine Rich Chocolate - 12 oz (Pack of 6)
s: Enjoy Hot or Cold. Cold: Add 2 Tbsp Ovaltine to 8oz cold milk and stir well. Hot: Place 2 Tbsp Ovaltine in mug. Add 8oz hot milk and stir well. Microwave: Heat 8oz milk in microwave-safe mug for 1-1/2 minutes or until warm.

t: Amazon.com : OVALTINE Rich Chocolate Milk Mix 18 oz. Canister (Pack of 4) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Ovaltine has been around for a very long time. I used to mix up Ovaltine when my girls were little. Now that I have grandkids, I mix Ovaltine for hot chocolate since my grandkids love it! I saw how unhealthy other brands were with so much sugar and nothing else.

t: Ovaltine - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - Ovaltine, a registered trademark of Associated British Foods, is made by Wander AG, a subsidiary of Twinings, which acquired the brand from Novartis in 2002, except in the United States, where Nestlé acquired the rights separately from Novartis in the late 2000s.

t: Amazon.com : Ovaltine Chocolate Malt Powdered Drink Mix For Hot And Cold Milk Canister 12 oz : Grocery & Gourmet Food
Amazon.com : Ovaltine Chocolate Malt, 12 oz : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I love ovaltine. I love Ovaltine. It mixes fast and easy and I love the taste that's why I say I love Ovaltine. I don't look at the calories and I don't look at the sugar content. I don't drink gallons of it everyday. I drink it once or twice a week and that's enough to last me until the next ...
